meanings.definition: Not capable of being transferred to another.
meanings.sent1: The ticket was nontransferable, so I couldn't give it to my friend.
meanings.sent2: The nontransferable property deed could not be sold to anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The nontransferable coupon made me the only one eligible for the discount.
meanings.sent4: Her loyalty was like a nontransferable shield, protecting her from betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The nontransferable stamp on the document ensured its authenticity.

meanings.definition: Not able to be moved or passed from one person to another.
meanings.sent1: The nontransferable statue was too heavy to lift.
meanings.sent2: The nontransferable contract could not be assigned to anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The nontransferable handshake left me stuck in an awkward position.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like a nontransferable anchor, keeping him grounded.
meanings.sent5: The nontransferable barrier prevented anyone from crossing the line.
